Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that people turned into zombies because of the wrong vaccine, while in reality, the movie depicts mutant-like vampires caused by a genetically-modified virus.
Understate: No understatement bias is present in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by providing inaccurate information about the year and the cause of the outbreak in the movie.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion.
Problematic assumption: No problematic assumption bias is present in the claim.
Exist alternative explanation: No alternative explanation bias is present in the claim.
